H0.text: Which designer is famous for his/her red-soled footwear. Jimmy Choo

H1.text: Which designer is famous for his/her red-soled footwear. Manolo Blahnik

H2.text: Which designer is famous for his/her red-soled footwear. Christian Lacroix

H3.text: Which designer is famous for his/her red-soled footwear. Louboutin

A4.text: His stiletto footwear incorporates shiny, red-lacquered soles that have become his signature.

A5.text: He is most popularly known for the red leather soles on his high-heeled shoes.
